attributes.action: Stop UK and international call centres using local telephone codes and numbers
attributes.additional_details:
01736 672890
Penzance, England 

01736 672874
Penzance, England

These are just typical examples. They should never be allowed to do this.
attributes.background: I have received over 5 calls this week alone clearly from a call centre using a local telephone code. Numerous calls like this in fact over the last year. Some have been UK based and some have been clearly from other countries.

rejection.details:
The open petition similar to yours is:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/124578
